name: Static IP for LXC
description: Edit LXC network settings for a container with static IPs.

parameters.name: static_ip
parameters.description: Static IPv4 address in CIDR notation (e.g. 192.168.4.100/24).

parameters.name: static_ip6
parameters.description: Static IPv6 address in CIDR notation (e.g. fd00::50/64).

parameters.name: static_gw6
parameters.description: Static IPv6 gateway (e.g. fd00::1). Requires static_ip6.
